turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink from Peets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Which store do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 328 Manhattan Beach Blvd Manhattan Beach, C

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like The Black Tie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Would you like to add anything to the drink? Any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else you would like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Just the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the drink prepared immediately or schedule a later pick up time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it prepared immediately please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So your order is 1 The Black Tie with whole milk. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Your order will be ready for pick up at the Manhattan Beach Blvd in a little while. Your receipt has also been emailed to you. Is that all you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Have a wonderful day then.
